mdRecord.dcterms:description: It was the first building on the Colorado College campus, built between 1877 and 1880. Called "the College" it held all the offices, classrooms, a library, auditorium, and more for the burgeoning school. It is now used by the financial aid and admissions departments. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cutler_Hall [work]
